title: ADVISORY: Vice President Biden to Travel to Ohio to Highlight Progress of the Recovery Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 07, 2009

 



ADVISORY: Vice President Biden to Travel to Ohio to Highlight Progress of the Recovery Act




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  ___________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                          July 7, 2009    Vice President Biden to Travel to Ohio to Highlight Progress of the Recovery Act Washington, DC – On Thursday, July 9, Vice President Biden will travel to Cincinnati, OH, where he will highlight the progress of the Recovery Act in Ohio at the American Can Building.  The Vice President will discuss how the Recovery Act is building a 21st-century economy in Cincinnati and across the nation. The American Can Building is a formerly abandoned factory that is being converted to a multi-use economic development project.  A limited number general public tickets for the Vice President’s event in Cincinnati are available on a first-come, first-served basis on Wednesday, July 8, 2009, from 3:00 PM EDT – 6:00 PM EDT at the American Can Factory, 4101 Spring Grove Avenue, Cincinnati, OH 45223. Two tickets per person.  Please bring photo ID. This event is OPEN PRESS but media must RSVP to press@ovp.eop.gov by Wednesday, July 8, at 5:00 PM EDT. Media Details: Vice President Biden to travel to Cincinnati, Ohio, to highlight the progress of the Recovery Act           Date: Thursday, July 9, 2009  Location: American Can Building – 4101 Spring Grove Avenue, Cincinnati, OH 45223                           Press Entrance: Intersection of Langland St. and Moline Ct.                             Sat Truck Parking: Enter at the intersection of Langland St. and Moline Ct. Parking directed on-site.                           Press Parking:  Spaces reserved at 4030 Hamilton Avenue, Cincinnati, OH                    Camera Pre-set: 6:00 AM - 7:00 AM EDT                            Restricted Access: 7:00 AM- 8:30 AM EDT                         Press Arrival: 8:30 AM EDT                             Final Press Access: 9:45 AM EDT                         Event Begins: 10:15 AM EDT     Cable Run: 400 feet                           Throw: 40 feet RSVP: This event is OPEN PRESS, but media must RSVP with the NAME, MEDIA OUTLET, PHONE AND EMAIL for each person planning to cover the event to press@ovp.eop.gov by Wednesday July 8, at 5:00 PM EDT. At the  event, you will be required to wear your media credential at all times, either around the neck or pinned to clothing. For logistical questions, please call Jeff Tiller at 202-757-9839.    **NOTE: This event is outdoors. Wireless Internet is not available on-site. Limited workspace will be provided.
